sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not failor overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Nimantha Baranasuriya
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE `dataintegrity_integrity_checks` ( `dataintegrity_integrity_check_id` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `check_name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `check_sql` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, `check_score` DOUBLE NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dataintegrity_integrity_check_id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
